Sentencas: Despite the considerable efforts to develop innovative electrode materials, nickel/yttria-stabilized zirconia (Ni/YSZ) electrodes are still employed in nearly all commercial and industrial solid oxide cell units.
Titulo: Ni-doped CeO2 nanoparticles to promote and restore the performance of Ni/YSZ cathodes for CO2 electroreduction

Sentencas: This is because Ni/YSZ cermets have good electrocatalytic activity in both electrolysis and fuel cell modes, while they are cost-effective as compared to alternative electrodes under development at the lab scale.
Titulo: Ni-doped CeO2 nanoparticles to promote and restore the performance of Ni/YSZ cathodes for CO2 electroreduction

Sentencas: Infiltration of nanoparticles has immersed as a promising concept to enhance the performance and robustness of conventional Ni/YSZ.
Titulo: Ni-doped CeO2 nanoparticles to promote and restore the performance of Ni/YSZ cathodes for CO2 electroreduction

Sentencas: Herein, we apply a relatively simple procedure to infiltrate Ni/YSZ electrodes with hexane solution containing prefabricated Ni-doped CeO2 nanoparticles.
Titulo: Ni-doped CeO2 nanoparticles to promote and restore the performance of Ni/YSZ cathodes for CO2 electroreduction

Sentencas: Cells with modified Ni/YSZ electrodes show a great improvement in the electrocatalytic activity and stability towards direct CO2 reduction as compared to unmodified cathodes.
Titulo: Ni-doped CeO2 nanoparticles to promote and restore the performance of Ni/YSZ cathodes for CO2 electroreduction

Sentencas: Besides, a single infiltration step is sufficient to achieve the optimum cell performance, streamlining the preparation process.
Titulo: Ni-doped CeO2 nanoparticles to promote and restore the performance of Ni/YSZ cathodes for CO2 electroreduction

Sentencas: More importantly, we show that this strategy can be equally efficient to fully reactivate previously degraded Ni/YSZ electrodes and restore their electrochemical performance at levels even higher than the initial ones.
Titulo: Ni-doped CeO2 nanoparticles to promote and restore the performance of Ni/YSZ cathodes for CO2 electroreduction

Sentencas: In addition, due to the high viscosity of the hexane solution, Ni-doped CeO2 nanoparticles access the entire electrode volume all the way close to the YSZ interface, while it penetrates the micro cracks between Ni and YSZ particles.
Titulo: Ni-doped CeO2 nanoparticles to promote and restore the performance of Ni/YSZ cathodes for CO2 electroreduction

Sentencas: In this way the electrocatalytic reaction zone is recovered, and the degraded Ni/YSZ electrode is reactivated.
Titulo: Ni-doped CeO2 nanoparticles to promote and restore the performance of Ni/YSZ cathodes for CO2 electroreduction

Sentencas: Physicochemical, microstructural and electrochemical characterization of the cells evinces several effects that contribute to the performance improvement of Ni/YSZ after infiltration, such as the enhanced surface reducibility of Ni and the amelioration of charge transfer processes within the electrode.
Titulo: Ni-doped CeO2 nanoparticles to promote and restore the performance of Ni/YSZ cathodes for CO2 electroreduction

Sentencas: The simplicity of the proposed infiltration method and the significant promotion in CO2 electroreduction activity, advocate it as a cost-efficient strategy to improve or regenerate conventional Ni/YSZ electrodes without significantly altering the already well-established fabrication process.
Titulo: Ni-doped CeO2 nanoparticles to promote and restore the performance of Ni/YSZ cathodes for CO2 electroreduction
